      • start

           throws java.lang.Exception

        Specified by:

      • showRulesWindow

      • showAboutWindow

        public void showAboutWindow()

      • startGame

        public void startGame(boolean ai,
                      java.lang.String name1,
                      java.lang.String name2)
        starts a Game A new PLayingField will be generated and given to the Controller. The Controller will give it "flesh and bones". The PlayerController will initialize and generate the 2 players. The new players will be given again to the game controller to get their tokens.
        Parameters:
        ai - returns if the game is single- (ai = true) or Multiplayer
        name1 - The Name from Player 1
        name2 - The Name from Player 2
        See Also:
        GameLayoutController

      • winDialog

        public void winDialog(java.lang.String name)
        Shows a window when a player won. The player will have a chance to start the game again, to go to the main menu or to end the game.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the player that won the game.

      • returnToStart

        public void returnToStart()
        breaks the current game and returns to the main menu.
